content: measurements width approx 170 cm / 67 length approx 80 cm / 31 5 materials drops silke-alpaca from garnstudio 500 g colour no 1101 white 250 g colour no 6305 grey-turquoise drops crochet hook size 5 mm / h - or size needed to obtain 7 vertical row = 10 cm measured in the st direction and not along middle of shawl
